resources.string: The server is now reachable at
The server is not listening for incoming connections.
From a VNC viewer, Ctrl-Shift-Esc triggers \'Recent Apps\' overview, Home/Pos1 acts as Home button, End acts as Power button, Escape acts as Back button, Ctrl-Alt-PageUp/PageDown change audio volume.
This is droidVNC-NG %1$s. Please note that more features are still being added to droidVNC-NG. You can report any issues and feature requests at https://github.com/bk138/droidVNC-NG/issues

plurals.name: main_service_notification_text_not_listening
plurals.item: Not listening for incoming connections, %1$d client connected
Not listening for incoming connections, %1$d clients connected

plurals.name: main_service_notification_text_listening
plurals.item: Listening for incoming connections, %1$d client connected
Listening for incoming connections, %1$d clients connected

resources.string: Slow fallback screen capture mode active

This allows droidVNC-NG to post input events to the Android operating system, thus allowing remote control from a connected VNC viewer. All entered input is directly posted to Android, no input is logged, saved or shared.
To be able to remotely control your device, you need to enable accessibility for droidVNC-NG. Do you want to enable accessibility now?
To enable start on boot for droidVNC-NG, you need to enable accessibility for it. Do you want to enable accessibility now?
To be able to remotely control your device and to enable start on boot for droidVNC-NG, you need to enable accessibility for it. Do you want to enable accessibility now?
Could not find the default accessibility settings activity. Please enable droidVNC-NG in system accessibility settings manually.
To be able to transfer files to and from your device, you need to enable file access for droidVNC-NG. Do you want to enable file access now?

To be able to transfer files to and from your device, you need to enable file access for droidVNC-NG. Please note that saving files will only be possible in the \'Download\' and \'Documents\' directories. Do you want to enable file access now?
To be able to show server status information and provide a means of navigating back to the admin panel more easily, it is recommended to enable notifications. Do you want to enable notifications now?
Slow fallback screen capture mode detected
Do you want to upgrade to fast mode now?
Not shared text, server is not running.
Not shared text, no clients connected.
Shared text to clipboards of all connected clients.
